entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then clearing. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers later in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
